bill.title: Relating to emergency preparedness.
bill.description: Directs Oregon Department of Emergency Management to study and make recommendations regarding improvements to operations of department. Directs Oregon Department of Emergency Management to study and make recommendations regarding improvements to operations of department. Requires department to submit report on findings by September 15, 2024.
